name: Glider (itch) (raindropsPro)
description:
-Hyper-casual game with colorful platform and nice effects and very addictive

-Glide through the obstacles on your path with precision and focus

-Make a high-score and break the high-score

-Contains endless level

-Contains three more levels

-Try and reach the end of the level 3!

-Be quick and precise!

-Perfect game to kill some time

This is my very first game, nevertheless i hope you have fun playing.
